name: ext_R5_Consent_provision
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Consent.provision for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents Consent.provision from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Consent|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: An exception to the base policy of this consent. An exception can be an addition or removal of access permissions.
element.comment: `Consent.provision` maps to R3 `Consent.except`. Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
